data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Orhon, Mongolia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Orhon, Mongolia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 715 believers in Orhon to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Orhon.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Orhon, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Durbet, Dorwoten people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Durbet, Dorwoten people know you.
Please, teach the 715 believers in Orhon, Mongolia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Orhon, Mongolia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Orhon, Mongolia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

location.name: Orhon
location.people_groups_list: Darkhad, Dariganga, Uzbek, Northern, Torguud, Dungan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Darkhad (25,000), Dariganga (31,000), Uzbek, Northern (26,000), Torguud (16,000), Dungan (6,100)
